label: Receptionists
persona: Streamline front desk operations and guest management
summary: A complete reception management system designed for hotels, offices, and service businesses. Manage guest check-ins, appointments, visitor logs, and front desk workflows with AI-powered assistance. Perfect for receptionists who need to handle multiple tasks efficiently while providing excellent customer service.
bullet_1: Guest check-in/check-out workflows with automated notifications
bullet_2: Appointment scheduling and visitor management system
bullet_3: AI assistant for common guest queries and service requests
